Instruction: Heat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and grease cookie sheets.

Cream together shortening, margarine, white sugar, and brown sugar in a large bowl until smooth. Beat in eggs one at a time, then add peanut butter and vanilla. Combine flour, cocoa, baking powder, baking soda, and cream of tartar; stir into sugar mixture. Mix in oats, walnuts (if desired), and chocolate chips. Drop rounded spoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheets.
Bake the cookies in the preheated oven for 8 to 10 minutes. Let them cool on the baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.
